Text:
You sir, are a gentleman and a scholar.  These 480p, small-size files are perfect.  You are deserving of your skull.

I would like to know what program and what settings are used to convert these 480p files.

Also, have you considered uploading more of the FX Network shows and/or more of the Showtime/HBO shows?  Any would be very much appreciated.

Thanks again dude...
